x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
User is not able to reserve the location for whole day.
The user is not able to save the location for all day though he click the checkbox of "All Day" option on the reservation form.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: User is unable to reserve for whole day
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Please update the property value of "reservation_default_duration" , Make its default value to all_day from any other value to Set the Default Duration to Whole day and it resolves the issue.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: User is unable to reserve for whole day
